table.name: CurationsLA Weekend Events
table.content:
🌴 CurationsLA: Friday - Sunday Events

September 26-28, 2025

Source: The Scenestar's on-screen show list

FRIDAY'S EVENTS
5:00PM 🎸 NEKO CASE ('NEON GREY MIDNIGHT GREEN' LISTENING PARTY) intimate album experience brings fans together at AMOEBA MUSIC HOLLYWOOD
5:30PM 🎧 PULP Britpop legends return with anthemic energy and nostalgic power at HOLLYWOOD BOWL
6:00PM 🎸 DAISY THE GREAT brings indie charm and devoted fanbase at W/ THE OPHELIAS & THEO MOSS AT EL CID
6:00PM 🎷 JAZZ AT LACMA brings sophisticated soundscapes and musical virtuosity at LACMA W/ ALEXIS LOMBRE AT LACMA SMIDT WELCOME PLAZA
7:00PM 🎵 TATE MCRAE Pop sensation delivers chart-topping hits and dynamic performance at KIA FORUM
7:00PM 🎸 CHEVELLE delivers chart-topping hits and dynamic performance at HOLLYWOOD PALLADIUM
7:00PM 🎸 THE HOLD STEADY Alt-rock anthems and punchy live energy kick off at TERAGRAM BALLROOM
7:00PM 🎸 S.G. GOODMAN brings indie charm and devoted fanbase at TROUBADOUR
7:00PM 🎸 MR. GNOME delivers chart-topping hits and dynamic performance at GOLD-DIGGERS
7:00PM 🎸 STOLEN GIN kicks off with punchy live energy and anthems at ECHO
